abstract: JPMorgan Chase on Friday named its head of restructuring, Norma Corio, as its new treasurer, filling in a spot that had been vacant since June.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase on Friday named its head of restructuring, Norma Corio, as its new treasurer, filling in a spot that had been vacant since June.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase on Friday named its head of restructuring, Norma Corio, as its new treasurer, filling in a spot that had been vacant since June.
